taskbody.context: Data Collectorviewing and downloading log datalog filesviewing and downloading Data CollectorYou can view and download log data. When you download log data, you can select the file to download.

step.cmd: To view log data for the , click Administration Logs .
step.info: The console displays roughly 50,000 characters of the most recent log information.

step.cmd: To view earlier events, click Load Previous Logs.
To download the latest log file, click Download. To download a specific log file, click Download <file name> .
step.info: The most recent information is in the file with the highest number.
